data.text: @UnitedCenter @chicagobulls @NHLBlackhawks If our congressional leaders don’t need Covid tests to enter house chambers, we don’t need Covid tests to enter the United Center. Enough of the pseudoscience theatre!
@UnitedCenter @chicagobulls @NHLBlackhawks Your updated policy DISGUSTS me. No more mandates!!!
@UnitedCenter @ByScottPowers @chicagobulls @NHLBlackhawks Don't attend. This isn't about health. Don't comply with movement restrictions.
@UnitedCenter @chicagobulls @NHLBlackhawks Absolute morons. Don’t u know the Science changed?!?!?
@JeremyH01958145 @UnitedCenter @chicagobulls @NHLBlackhawks more people need to do what you re doing!
@BolognaBudz @UnitedCenter @NHLBlackhawks @chicagobulls just like all their stupid moves and hirings
@kezcartann @UnitedCenter @chicagobulls @NHLBlackhawks got that right! Management blows chunks
@UnitedCenter @chicagobulls @NHLBlackhawks Well guess I’m not buying those 350 dollar TOOL tickets!
